meanings.sent1: Her puissances in the company helped her get promoted.
meanings.sent2: The king's puissances extended throughout the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's puissances were so strong that even villains admired them.
meanings.sent4: The puissances of nature could be felt in the roaring thunderstorm.
meanings.sent5: The puissances of the ancient artifact were said to bring luck to its owner.

meanings.sent1: The puissances of the storm were evident in the howling winds.
meanings.sent2: The wrestler's puissances were unmatched in the ring.
meanings.sent3: The puissances of the waterfall were so strong that they could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent4: The puissances of the ocean waves crashed against the shore relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: The puissances of the locomotive engine propelled the train forward with great speed.

meanings.definition: Ability to act or produce an effect
meanings.sent1: Her puissances in problem-solving made her the go-to person in the team.
meanings.sent2: The magician's puissances amazed the audience with each trick.
meanings.sent3: The cat's puissances in catching mice were put to the test in the old barn.
meanings.sent4: The puissances of the new technology revolutionized the industry overnight.
meanings.sent5: The artist's puissances in painting brought life to the canvas in vibrant colors.
